title: МОРЕ. ГОРЫ. КЕРАМЗИТ
overview: In one of the coastal towns of Sochi called "Fun" the Russian old believers coexist side by side with the Circassians, Armenians, Greeks. Flows measured life: the old believers pray and vegetables, and the rest earn on tourists. The son of tavern owners, Armen falls in love with a girl-the old believer Seraphim. Suddenly the usual life of the village breaks the news: Sochi Olympics will be. In the village Merry comes to Olympic construction. The local inhabitants perceive the Olympic games to bayonets.
